p:
The mediation model for the low climate consensus condition is detailed in Fig 4. Reading a message about a low (63%) level of agreement among climate scientists did not have a significant indirect effect on belief that human-caused climate change is occurring, ab = -.09, 95% CI [-.20, .02]; ab
ps = -.11, 95% CI [-.26, .03]. This indicates that changes in estimated consensus caused by reading a low consensus message do not have a subsequent effect on belief that human-caused climate change is occurring.
